channel.title: Death stage, player rights and if they are in jail or not? (expert help needed)
channel.description:
Ok im looking too create something that stops people hanging around my jail. i want them too die if they enter certain coords around the jail. the only exceptions are people with player rights +1 or if they have actually been jailed.
i can figure the code out if they are staff or not, but how is someone determined between being jailed and not being jailed?
and how can i apply a deathstage too them from that?
thanks alot.

item.title: Death stage, player rights and if they are in jail or not? (expert help needed)
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

[quote=“bonzakid, post:4, topic:274380”]I’m not.
Im just saying why not make a new jail where players cant get to other players.
Would be less the hassle…[/quote]

im doing that, allthough i want this code still in place, do you know the answer to my question(s) ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 19, 2009, 01:08:28 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic
